page.title: 16GOURDIE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The South East Kilometre of our block consists mainly of the Gourdie Industrial Estate although there is a small farmstead called Gourdie Cottages.This land has been taken over by the Milnfield Research Group who are experimenting with different crops. The Industrial Estate is dominated by the world renown National Cash Register Company which specializes in Electronic machines,Cash Registers and Banking Terminals. The"Cash"came to Dundee shortly after the second world war and at one time in the late 60's was Dundee's largest employer with over 6000 employees. The advent of electronics as opposed to mechanical production however meant a reduction in the workforce and they now employ only 1000 people.
